document_data.Description: Porios was something of a pragmatist rather than idealist.
document_data.History:
During the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Porios was under the employ of the [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Sarevok Anchev]] during his attempted coup in [[Baldur's Gate]]. After Sarevok's death, Porios stole his ''[[Sarevok's sword of chaos|sword of chaos]]'' from the [[Ducal Palace]] under the direction of the Bhaalspawn's loyal disciple [[Korlasz]].

Soon after, Porios and his crew were caught by the [[Hero of Baldur's Gate]].
